title.rendered: How to Get the Job or Internship You Want

content.rendered: With thousands of jobs and internships for students and new grads, Handshake is the place to find the right job for you. And it’s as easy as creating your profile and taking a few important steps. From saving jobs to following employers, see how the actions you take on Handshake will put you on the path to a great job!

excerpt.rendered: Follow these easy steps to finding the right jobs and getting hired on Handshake.
